long_description: The Thule Doubletrack 2-bike hitch rack has all your bike transportation needs covered, regardless of what type of bike you ride. Ratcheting quick-load hooks adjust independently to cradle the top tubes of your bikes; foldable center mast allows quick storage. Adjustable wheel trays slide independently to eliminate bike-to-bike contact and accommodate bikes with wheelbases up to 48 in. and tires up to 3 in. wide. Tilt-down design with Hitch Switch(TM) quick-release lever allows quick storage when not in use. Stinger Swinger(TM) hitch adaptor converts quickly from a 2 to 1.25 in. hitch receiver right out of the box. Secure your rack to the receiver with the Snug Tite(TM) lock accessory, included. 2 One-key lock cylinders to lock bikes to rack also included.
short_description: The Thule Doubletrack 2-bike hitch rack has all your bike transportation needs covered, regardless of what type of bike you ride.
